title: ATB: Seven Years (1998-2005)
overview: Limited Edition DVD. After over 11 years and 5 ATB albums, the last 4 of which all made it into the German Top 10, Andre Tanneberger has become a leading musician and producer and not just on the dance scene. The International stars Heather Nova, Moby, William Orbit and Michael Cretu from Enigma have all called on his services. He also performed with Bryan Adams at Rock In Rio, supplied remixes for pop legends like A-Ha and has traveled all over the world to play as a DJ.
